Reaction: D-aspartate + H2O + O2 = oxaloacetate + NH3 + H2O2

Commentary_MetaCyc: A zinc protein. The enzyme from the archaeon |FRAME: TAX-82076| is involved in glucose and galactose catabolism via the nonphosphorylative variant of the Entner-Doudoroff pathway. It shows 20-fold higher activity with NADP+ compared tor NAD+. The oxidation of D-glucose and D-galactose is catalysed at a comparable rate (cf. |FRAME: EC-1.1.1.119 "EC 1.1.1.119, glucose 1-dehydrogenase (NADP+)"| and |FRAME: EC-1.1.1.120 "EC 1.1.1.120, galactose 1-dehydrogenase (NADP+)"|).
